summary: This bill, the "Innovate Less Lethal to De-Escalate Tax Modernization Act," aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code to modernize the National Firearms Act.  Specifically, it exempts certain less-than-lethal projectile devices from excise taxes and the National Firearms Act, as defined in the bill. The Secretary of the Treasury is tasked with establishing and annually updating a public list of compliant devices. The bill's provisions apply to articles sold after its enactment.
